import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={value:0};export var answeredCorrect_Slice=createSlice({name:'answeredCorrect',initialState:initialState,reducers:{increase_answeredCorrect:function increase_answeredCorrect(state){state.value+=1;}}});// Action creators are generated for each case reducer function
var increase_answeredCorrect=answeredCorrect_Slice.actions.increase_answeredCorrect;export{increase_answeredCorrect};export default answeredCorrect_Slice.reducer;
